text: A Deterministic Counter Automaton (DCA) is a deterministic pushdown automaton whose stack alphabet consists of just one symbol (other than empty stack symbol Zo). Just like a PDA, at every transition a DCA can push or pop a symbol from the stack, and can test for the stack being empty. Which of the following languages is/are accepted by a DCA? (a) fanb= | n e N} (b) fwhw? | w e {0, 1% (O fvof | we 0, 1% (d) fwuw | w,ue 0, 1*}
